content:
I've been keeping loose tabs on the LLVM-dev Mailing List regarding the noalias unsoundness.

Regarding that, they just had a call about it yesterday. Here are the call notes: https://docs.google.com/document/u/0/d/1ybwEKDVtIbhIhK50qYtwKsL50K-NvB6LfuBsfepBZ9Y
And here's one of the most relevant messages (with links and stuff that to me seem relevant to their discussion): http://lists.llvm.org/pipermail/llvm-dev/2020-May/141832.html
So my read on this is... hey, they might start picking the noalias issue up at long last! :3
